title: Minnesota Firm Recalls Canned Chicken Products Due To Mislabeling And Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, July 27, 2012 - Tony Downs Foods Company, a Madelia, Minn., establishment is recalling approximately 70,500 pounds of premium chunk chicken due to mislabeling and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products may...
